game.name: FEATHERED RUN
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: FEATHERED RUN is a 4-button precision platformer-runner with 2D graphics. Embark on an exciting escape through Antarctica. Playing as one of the seemingly helpless penguins.
